verses.verse: In the tenth <S%H6224><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month, in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him, and against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

Speak, <S%H1696><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I am against <S%H5921><s%> you, Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> dragon <S%H8577><s%> that lies <S%H6437><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of his rivers, <S%H2975><s%> which has said, <S%H559><s%> My river <S%H2975><s%> is my own, and I have made <S%H6213><s%> it for myself.

But I will put <S%H5414><s%> hooks <S%H2397><s%> in your jaws, <S%H3895><s%> and I will cause the fish <S%H1710><s%> of your rivers <S%H2975><s%> to stick <S%H1692><s%> to your scales, <S%H7193><s%> and I will bring <S%H5927><s%> you up out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of your rivers, <S%H2975><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the fish <S%H1710><s%> of your rivers <S%H2975><s%> shall stick <S%H1692><s%> to your scales. <S%H7193><s%>

And I will leave <S%H5203><s%> you thrown into the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> you and all <S%H3605><s%> the fish <S%H1710><s%> of your rivers: <S%H2975><s%> you shall fall <S%H5307><s%> on the open <S%H6440><s%> fields; <S%H7704><s%> you shall not be brought <S%H622><s%> together, nor <S%H3808><s%> gathered: <S%H6908><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> you for meat <S%H402><s%> to the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H776><s%> and to the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the heaven. <S%H8064><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> they have been <S%H1961><s%> a staff <S%H4938><s%> of reed <S%H7070><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

When they took <S%H8610><s%> hold <S%H8610><s%> of you by your hand, <S%H3709><s%> you did break, <S%H7533><s%> and rend <S%H1234><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their shoulder: <S%H3802><s%> and when they leaned <S%H8172><s%> on you, you brake, <S%H7665><s%> and made all <S%H3605><s%> their loins <S%H4975><s%> to be at a stand. <S%H5976><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> on you, and cut <S%H3772><s%> off man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> out of you.

And the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall be desolate <S%H8077><s%> and waste; <S%H2723><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> he has said, <S%H559><s%> The river <S%H2975><s%> is mine, and I have made <S%H6213><s%> it.

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> you, and against <S%H413><s%> your rivers, <S%H2975><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> utterly waste <S%H2723><s%> and desolate, <S%H8077><s%> from the tower <S%H4024><s%> of Syene <S%H5482><s%> even to the border <S%H1366><s%> of Ethiopia. <S%H3568><s%>

No <S%H3808><s%> foot <S%H7272><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> shall pass <S%H5674><s%> through it, nor <S%H3808><s%> foot <S%H7272><s%> of beast <S%H929><s%> shall pass <S%H5674><s%> through it, neither <S%H3808><s%> shall it be inhabited <S%H3427><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the countries <S%H776><s%> that are desolate, <S%H8074><s%> and her cities <S%H5892><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> that are laid waste <S%H2717><s%> shall be desolate <S%H8077><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years: <S%H8141><s%> and I will scatter <S%H6327><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and will disperse <S%H2219><s%> them through the countries. <S%H776><s%>

Yet <S%H3588><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> At the end <S%H7093><s%> of forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> will I gather <S%H6908><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> from the people <S%H5971><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they were scattered: <S%H6327><s%>

And I will bring <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and will cause them to return <S%H7725><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Pathros, <S%H6624><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of their habitation; <S%H4351><s%> and they shall be there <S%H8033><s%> a base <S%H8217><s%> kingdom. <S%H4467><s%>

It shall be the basest <S%H8217><s%> of the kingdoms; <S%H4467><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall it exalt <S%H5375><s%> itself any more above <S%H5921><s%> the nations: <S%H1471><s%> for I will diminish <S%H4591><s%> them, that they shall no <S%H3808><s%> more rule <S%H7287><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

And it shall be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> the confidence <S%H4009><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which brings <S%H2142><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> to remembrance, <S%H2142><s%> when they shall look <S%H6437><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them: but they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass in the seven <S%H7651><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month, in the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> Nebuchadrezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> caused his army <S%H2428><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> service <S%H5656><s%> against <S%H413><s%> Tyrus: <S%H6865><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> was made bald, <S%H7139><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> shoulder <S%H3802><s%> was peeled: <S%H4803><s%> yet had <S%H1961><s%> he no <S%H3808><s%> wages, <S%H7939><s%> nor his army, <S%H2428><s%> for Tyrus, <S%H6865><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> that he had served <S%H5647><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it:

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to Nebuchadrezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon; <S%H894><s%> and he shall take <S%H5375><s%> her multitude, <S%H1995><s%> and take <S%H962><s%> her spoil, <S%H7997><s%> and take <S%H962><s%> her prey; <S%H957><s%> and it shall be the wages <S%H7939><s%> for his army. <S%H2428><s%>

I have given <S%H5414><s%> him the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for his labor <S%H6468><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> he served <S%H5647><s%> against it, because <S%H834><s%> they worked <S%H6213><s%> for me, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> will I cause the horn <S%H7161><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to bud <S%H6779><s%> forth, and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you the opening <S%H6610><s%> of the mouth <S%H6310><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of them; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
